doc.previous: The influence of the French Impressionists lasted long after most of them had died Artists like J D Kirszenbaum were borrowing Impressionist techniques throughout the 1900s
doc.after: As the influence of Impressionism spread beyond France artists too numerous to list became identified as practitioners of the new style Some of the more important examples are
